chapters.title: Chapter 49: Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Marinna, p. 732—Quadruplet sister of Janduin, Alarch, and Padra during Aviendha's sixth step through the columns of Rhuidean. She is small of build and has a round face. She and her quadruplet siblings are as unlike as it seems it is possible for siblings to be. They have special status among the Aiel as the children of Aviendha and Rand. See also al'Thor, Rand; Alarch; Aviendha; Janduin; Padra.
